cleaned_text: Reiki Healing and Energy Balancing The word Reiki is made of two Japanese words - Rei which means "God's Wisdom or the Higher Power" and Ki which is "life force energy". So Reiki is actually "spiritually guided life force energy." In the same way the body requires a clear flow of oxygen to breath, it also requires a clear flow of energy without blocks for optimum mental and physical health. What to expect during your treatment First of all, clarity on your direction and purpose in life! Secondly, clearing fears, limiting beliefs and negative thought patterns to allow you to grow and move forward. Thirdly, an action plan will be designed specific to you, based on your needs, desires, and goals. Finally and most importantly, how to self-nurture and connect to love. Types of treatments Include: AromaReiki Treatment During this treatment Daniella drawson her years of learning and practicing many healing modalities and has created her own unique practice called AromaReiki. It brings together the nurturing energy of Reiki, aromatherapy and massage. In addition to clearing any energy blocks in the key chakra points, she uses the natural healing essence of essential oils and crystals to support thebody's innate ability to heal itself, boost the immune system, and release stress in the muscles caused by emotional blocks or trauma through deep tissue massage. By clearing the pathways for energy to flow through the body, it sharpensintuition, increases abundance, reduces anxiety and improves motivation.This, combined with Daniella's learnt ancient rituals of communicating with the body's higher consciousness, she can assist in releasing ties of other people's attachments, tune into spirits passed over and reduceemotional fears and the feeling of being stuck so you can move past old patterns and be the best version of you possible. A treatment feels like a wonderful glowing radiance that flows through and around you. AromaReiki treats the whole person including body, emotions, mind and spirit creating many beneficial effects that include relaxation and feelings of peace, security and wellbeing and it's absolutely Blissful! Suitable for all ages including tweens and teenagers. Phone Coaching and Energy Balancing Sessions Daniella offers an easy to follow, practical and emotional healing session held over the phone or Skype. By guiding you to establish a relationship with your own healing potential, this supports shifts in blocked emotions, feeling stuck or a lack of enthusiasm or a run of bad luck. You will experience joy, peace and a comfortable flow in life. During these sessions (phone calls) you can expect the following: Lifestyle and nutritional assessment Gradual goal setting and manifesting on all lifestyle aspects. Personalised planning and trouble shooting Gut health coaching Emotional support Energetic healing Guided visualisations Initiative clarification Review and reassessment Self empowerment and knowledge to become your own coach. Suitable for all ages including tweens and teenagers.
